title: Did Economists Ruin The Economy With Binyamin Appelbaum
description: Are the economists of the 60s and 70s to blame for our current state of affairs? That's the argument Binyamin Appelbaum makes in his book "The Economists' Hour". On this episode, Kate and Luigi debate the history of economists, the problems with economics today, and what changes could lead to a better economic future.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
